statements: UPDATE Interview_Transcripts SET interviewee_name = 'John Doe' WHERE transcript_id = 1
UPDATE Interview_Transcripts SET interviewer_name = 'Jane Smith', transcript_text = 'Updated transcript' WHERE transcript_id = 2
UPDATE Interview_Transcripts SET interviewer_name = 'John Doe', interviewee_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE transcript_id = 1;

UPDATE Interview_Transcripts SET transcript_text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam ac fringilla eros. Quisque consequat nunc ut justo rutrum, ac scelerisque mi mollis. Aenean semper posuere ex eget tincidunt. Donec pharetra magna ac nulla sodales, id dignissim est vehicula. Vivamus tristique quam ligula, a condimentum nibh laoreet ac. Integer at tellus eget arcu pellentesque scelerisque vel vel metus.' WHERE transcript_id = 2;
UPDATE interview_transcripts SET transcript_text = 'Updated transcript for participant 123' WHERE id = 1;
